CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 12, 1961, pg. A14, reads: "A Happy Family - Mrs. Lenorah E. Coffey, seated, center, was pleasently surprised recently, with a visit by two of her several granddaughters from Philadelphia. She was honored at an elaborate dinner at the home of her daughter-in-law, Mrs. M. Edna Coffey and daughter, Margaret; Mrs. Dorthy Anderson, Joshua Bonner, Dr. and Mrs. Andrew Brazington and Andrew Jr., and Edward E. Coffey. The honoree, who is 91 years old, holds grandaughter Therese. Also shown is 'Rags,' a Chinese Chow dog, who enjoys guarding "Grandma Coffey," just as she has guarded most of her 42 offsprings of five generations. She has five great-great-great grandchildren. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Coffey family, including Lenorah E. Coffey seated in center holding grandaughter Therese, Edna Coffey and daughter Margaret Coffey, Dorthy Anderson, Joshua Bonner, Dr. Andrew Brazington, Mrs. Brazington, Andrew Brazengton Jr., Edward E. Coffey, and Rags the Chinese Chow dog, posed in yard with ivy covered wall in background, vertical format
